Summary: it was like a really skinny cigar
trends: There have been no other sightings in Monroeville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driveing from monroeville heading home to bellevue and next to a jet stream following an airplane it was going 3 times faster then the airplane cought up with the plane and then disappeared as soon as it got on the plane my wife was right beside me and saw a total different shape of the object somehow she said it was a circle which is really strange because i no i saw a very skinny cigar object almost like a sting shape the same size as the airplane
